item.title: Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy Denies Congress Switch, Affirms Loyalty to BRS
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy Clarifies: "I Am Still in BRS"
Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy has strongly clarified that he remains with the Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS). He expressed anger over certain individuals who put up flex banners falsely claiming that he had joined the Congress party, calling it an attempt to tarnish his reputation.
The MLA accused his opponents of deliberately spreading misinformation about him and stated that he has lodged a complaint at the Ga...]]>
item.author: The Hans India

item.title: BJP Demands Immediate Appointment of DPO in Jogulamba Gadwal to Resolve Panchayat Issues
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The BJP Jogulamba Gadwal district president, S. Ramachandra Reddy, held a press meet at the party office in Ayija town, demanding the immediate appointment of a District Panchayat Officer (DPO).
Speaking on the occasion, he highlighted that the DPO was suspended 15 days ago by the ACB on corruption charges, leaving the district without a key official. As a result, development works across the 240 gram panchayats have come to a halt.
He pointed out that the tenure of the Gram Panchayat ...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
